name: Pokémon Party
description:
✦ Controls ✦

P1: WASD

P2: TFGH

P3: IJKL

P4: Aʀʀᴏᴡ Kᴇʏs

Press Space/W/T/I/UP to use dice block.

Press P to pause/resume on the board.

✦ Cast ✦

- Cyndaquil

- Empoleon

- Hisuian Lilligant

- Delphox

- Mega Blaziken

 -Eiscue

- Garchomp

- Meowscarada 

- Furret

- Pikachu

-Ceruledge

- Lopunny

- Alolan Raichu

- Marshadow

- Spheal

- Inteleon

✦ Dice Block Descriptions ✦

bit.ly/diceblockdescriptions
